title: General Manager Job at Trinity Financial
content:
Trinity Financial is a limited liability company duly incorporated in Nigeria under the 2002 Companies and Allied Matters Act. licensed and supervised by the Central Bank of Nigeria as a full-fledged Financial Service Firm.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	A banking and finance company based in Victoria Island is in need of a general managerwho is focused on innovation, customer satisfaction, and operational efficiency.
	We are looking for a passionate and experienced general manager to lead our team and drive business success.


Job Overview


	You will be responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of the business, ensuring strategic goals are met, and fostering a positive and productive work environment.
	As the general manager, you will collaborate with department heads, manage budgets, streamline processes, and contribute to the overall growth of the organization.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead, manage, and oversee daily business operations across all departments
	Develop and execute strategic plans to achieve company objectives and growth targets
	Monitor performance metrics and implement improvements to maximize efficiency and profitability.
	Manage budgets, forecasts, and financial reporting in collaboration with the finance team
	Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, partners, and vendors
	Ensure compliance with company policies and all applicable regulations
	Recruit, train, and mentor key team members and department leaders
	Foster a positive workplace culture that promotes accountability, innovation, and teamwork


Qualifications


	A Master's Degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field (MBA preferred)
	Proven experience as a General Manager, Operations Manager, and relevant experience in credit and marketing role
	Must have ACA qualification
	Strong leadership skills with a track record of building high-performing teams
	Excellent communication, organizational, and decision-making abilities
	In-depth knowledge of business operations, finance, and performance management principles
	Proficiency with business management software and tools.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
	health insurance
	Professional development opportunities
	Collaborative and supportive company culture
	Opportunity to make a significant impact on a growing business, etc.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: info@trinityfinancialng.com and Trinityfinancialng01@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified applicants will be contacted for an interview.

title: Maintenance Facility Supervisor Job at De Talents
content:
De Talents is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Maintenance Facility Supervisor
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Daily inspection of all service equipment’s/utilities in the building (with checklist). Act on all ensuing issues.
	Develop checklists for the assigned facility and monitor same.
	Report back to the Maintenance Manager on regular basis.
	Monitor of all service equipment’s to minimize down time.
	Implementation of all maintenance schedules preplanned for routine maintenance activities.
	Available primary contact to company clients on their facilities issues.
	Assessment of facility maintenance requirements and material estimates for procurements.
	Supervision of all maintenance works and facilities renovations by company contractors to ensure works are done to company defined standards and scopes.
	Solve building maintenance problems should they occur.
	Effective utilization and supervision of the maintenance team consisting of plumbers, electricians, cleaners etc. to achieve good service delivery to the company customers.
	Logging of maintenance activities/breakdowns.
	Attend periodic maintenance department meetings.
	Intermediary between the maintenance team and other departments in the company.
	Follow up with Accounts on maintenance requests, reporting status on a regular basis to (FMM).
	Record keeping of job cards for each flat.
	Record keeping of expenditure for each flat.
	Record keeping and updating of service history of all company plant & equipment.
	Inventory control.
	Provide HSE admin support to the department staff and assist with producing reports on HSE.
	Perform all other maintenance, mechanical and administrative duties as assigned by Line Manager.
	Assist in sourcing for contractors and materials for procurement.
	Assist in monitoring of staff attendance and collation of attendance registers for HR.
	Regular checks on building HSE and security related measures to ensure compliance with standards.
	Assist in monitoring of diesel levels in facilities and all other duties as assigned or required by Line Manager.


Requirements
Education and Qualifications:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical, Mechanical Enineering, or any related field.
	Engineering and Health & Safety Certifications will be an added advantage. E.g. COREN, HSE 1, 2, 3. First Aid, Fire-fighting, Work a height, COSHH, HVAC, IOSH working safely or managing safely etc.


Experience:


	Minimum of 5 years of experience as a maintenance supervisor.
	Strong knowledge of building trades and maintenance.
	Solid understanding of health and safety regulations and practices.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to: hrdetalents@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Your work experience should reflect start and end months and year (Example: July 2013 – May 2018).
	Only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Pharmacist Job at Stratom Concept Limited
content:
Stratom Concept Limited is a fast-growing multi-sector company with operations across the retail, pharmaceutical, beauty, and wellness industries. We are committed to delivering premium products and services through our network of salons, pharmacies, supermarkets in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pharmacist

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our reputable and fast-growing retail pharmacy in Port Harcourt, is seeking a qualified Pharmacist to join our team. The ideal candidate must be professional, customer-focused, and committed to delivering excellent healthcare services while actively contributing to the growth of the business through product recommendations and upselling.


Key Responsibilities


	Dispense prescription and over-the-counter medications accurately
	Provide professional advice on medication use, dosage, and potential side effects
	Ensure all prescriptions comply with regulatory and legal standards
	Cross-sell complementary health products and drive daily sales targets
	Offer personalized recommendations to customers based on their health needs
	Monitor stock levels and ensure proper storage of pharmaceuticals
	Supervise and support pharmacy assistants in daily operations
	Ensure compliance with pharmacy laws, guidelines, and ethical practices
	Maintain excellent customer service standards and promote health awareness


Requirements


	B.Pharm or Pharm.D from a recognized institution
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a retail or community pharmacy preferred
	Valid license from the Pharmacists Council of Nigeria (PCN)
	Female preferably for gender balance
	Strong communication, sales, and interpersonal skills
	Goal-oriented and proactive in achieving branch sales targets
	Familiarity with pharmacy software and inventory systems is an advantage.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover letter to: hrstratomconcept@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.
